title: Bouffe Front presentation at SFEIR: How to make fast web frontends
description: I presented my article "How to make fast web frontends", at the SFEIR event Bouffe Front, in french.

fr.title: Présentation Bouffe Front à SFEIR: Comment faire des frontends web performants
